argument.description: The substring to search for in string.

description: The PostgreSQL position function returns the location of a substring in a string.
sample:
postgres=# SELECT position('T' in 'Tech on the net');
 position
----------
        1
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT position('t' in 'Tech on the net');
 position
----------
        9
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT position('h' in 'techonthenet.com');
 position
----------
        4
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT position('Z' in 'techonthenet.com');
 position
----------
        0
(1 row)
